title: REMOVE_BLIP
content:
0xD8C3C1CD// RemoveBlip
void REMOVE_BLIP(Blip* blip);Parameters:blip: Blip handle to remove.Removes the blip from your map.
Note: This function only works on the script that created the blip, if you wish to remove blips created by other scripts, see SET_THIS_SCRIPT_CAN_REMOVE_BLIPS_CREATED_BY_ANY_SCRIPT.This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native REMOVE_BLIP.
